data.title: Destiny 2 Nightfall Weapon this Week: Full Rotation
data.meta_description: Looking to farm a Nightfall weapon this week? This guide covers the entire rotation, including this week's sweet loot, which is the...
data.text:
Warden's Law

Warden's Law

Hand Cannon

Hand CannonHeavy BurstPrimaryKineticFree-to-PlayYesS › BestNightfall: The Ordeals

Best

❘ S

Excels in:

PvE + PvPNightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Kinetic | Ammo: Primary | Archetype: Heavy Burst

PvE God Roll: Fourth Time's the Charm (also good: Perpetual Motion) + Vorpal Weapon (also good: Frenzy )

PvP God Roll: Moving Target (also good: Discord) + Kill Clip

► While Warden's Law is only known for one thing (absurdly high DPS with the Hunter's Lucky Pants), it does exceptionally well at it. Although it definitely isn't a meta pick outside of that one use case, that alone bursts it above most of the pack; plus, it's an extremely fun and unique gun to use regardless!Season 22

Slot: Kinetic | Ammo: Primary | Archetype: Heavy Burst

PvE God Roll: Fourth Time's the Charm (also good: Perpetual Motion) + Vorpal Weapon (also good: Frenzy )

PvP God Roll: Moving Target (also good: Discord) + Kill ClipTop-tier Scintillation

Scintillation

Linear Fusion Rifle

Linear Fusion RifleAdaptiveHeavyStrandFree-to-PlayYesS › BestNightfall: The Ordeals

Best

❘ S

Excels in:

PvENightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Strand | Ammo: Heavy | Archetype: Adaptive

PvE God Roll: Rewind Rounds (also good: Envious Assassin) + Bait and Switch (also good: Surrounded)

► In PvE, Scintillation is one of the best linear fusion rifles out there. Despite the current meta favoring rocket launchers and heavy grenade launchers, the top LFRs continue to hold their ground. Scintillation is an easy addition to those options.The Final Shape

Slot: Strand | Ammo: Heavy | Archetype: Adaptive

PvE God Roll: Rewind Rounds (also good: Envious Assassin) + Bait and Switch (also good: Surrounded)Top-tier Horror's Least

Horror's Least

Pulse Rifle

Pulse RifleRapid-FirePrimaryArcFree-to-PlayYesS › BestNightfall: The Ordeals

Best

❘ S

Excels in:

PvPNightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Arc | Ammo: Primary | Archetype: Rapid-Fire

PvP God Roll: Perpetual Motion (also good: Heating Up) + Kill Clip

► Able to dominate in the Crucible at mid-range, Horror's Least is one of the best pulse rifles in the game. With great stats, an Adept variant, and a well-rounded perk pool, this weapon is a beast and worth grinding if you're a pulse rifle fan.Season 17

Slot: Arc | Ammo: Primary | Archetype: Rapid-Fire

PvP God Roll: Perpetual Motion (also good: Heating Up) + Kill Clip Top-tier Uzume RR4

Uzume RR4

Sniper Rifle

Sniper RifleAdaptiveSpecialSolarFree-to-PlayYesA › StrongNightfall: The Ordeals

Strong

❘ A

Excels in:

PvE + PvPNightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Solar | Ammo: Special | Archetype: Adaptive

PvE God Roll: Triple Tap + High-Impact Reserves (also good: Vorpal Weapon)

PvP God Roll: Snapshot Sights + Vorpal Weapon (also good: Explosive Payload)

► Uzume RR4 has always been an underrated pick for both PvE and PvP. While some options outclass it in various scenarios, there's no questioning Uzume's versatility and overall strength. If you're searching for a well-rounded option that won't do you wrong, Uzume RR4 may be worth farming.Season 14

Slot: Solar | Ammo: Special | Archetype: Adaptive

PvE God Roll: Triple Tap + High-Impact Reserves (also good: Vorpal Weapon)

PvP God Roll: Snapshot Sights + Vorpal Weapon (also good: Explosive Payload)Top-tier Silicon Neuroma

Silicon Neuroma

Sniper Rifle

Sniper RifleAggressiveSpecialKineticFree-to-PlayYesA › StrongNightfall: The Ordeals

Strong

❘ A

Excels in:

PvE + PvPNightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Kinetic | Ammo: Special | Archetype: Aggressive

PvE God Roll: Triple Tap + Firing Line

PvP God Roll: Snapshot Sights + Opening Shot

► Silicon Neuroma falls into the large pool of snipers that are great at face value but are desperately awaiting a buff to help them out. Its strong perk pool for both PvE and PvP makes it an easy choice for any 72 RPM sniper enthusiast, but the weapon probably won't become mainstream without a significant shift in the meta.Season 16

Slot: Kinetic | Ammo: Special | Archetype: Aggressive

PvE God Roll: Triple Tap + Firing Line

PvP God Roll: Snapshot Sights + Opening ShotTop-tier Wendigo GL3

Wendigo GL3

Grenade Launcher

Grenade LauncherAdaptiveHeavyArcFree-to-PlayYesA › StrongNightfall: The Ordeals

Strong

❘ A

Excels in:

PvE + PvPNightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Arc | Ammo: Heavy | Archetype: Adaptive

PvE God Rolls: Auto-Loading Holster (also good: Field Prep) + Explosive Light (also good: Cascade Point)

► Wendigo GL3's old curated roll is still available, and with spike grenades, it's actually better than its original incarnation for PvE. Try out Cascade Point for a different spin on DPS. For PvP, Grenade Launchers are top-tier, and the Wendigo GL3 is no exception. Impulse Amplifier + Rangefinder allows for a projectile speed of 58m/s, making securing kills remarkably easy with this weapon.Season 19

Slot: Arc | Ammo: Heavy | Archetype: Adaptive

PvE God Rolls: Auto-Loading Holster (also good: Field Prep) + Explosive Light (also good: Cascade Point)Top-tier PLUG ONE.1

PLUG ONE.1

Fusion Rifle

Fusion RiflePrecisionSpecialArcFree-to-PlayYesA › StrongNightfall: The Ordeals

Strong

❘ A

Excels in:

PvENightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Arc | Ammo: Special | Archetype: Precision

PvE God Roll: Bottomless Grief (also good: Feeding Frenzy) + Reservoir Burst (also good: Cornered)

► Still as strong as ever, PLUG ONE.1 is certainly not the best arc fusion out there, but it is a tried-and-true weapon that is a fun addition to any PvE loadout. While it may lack Voltshot, it still pairs nicely with Arc 3.0 when using Spark of Beacons.Season 14

Slot: Arc | Ammo: Special | Archetype: Precision

PvE God Roll: Bottomless Grief (also good: Feeding Frenzy) + Reservoir Burst (also good: Cornered)Top-tier Pre Astyanax IV

Pre Astyanax IV

Combat Bow

Combat BowPrecisionPrimarySolarFree-to-PlayYesA › StrongNightfall: The Ordeals

Strong

❘ A

Excels in:

PvENightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Solar | Ammo: Primary | Archetype: Precision

PvE God Roll: Archer's Tempo + Successful Warmup (also good: Explosive Head)

► With its roll of Archer's Tempo and Successful Warmup, Pre Astynax is essenitally the new Hush. But if a 540 draw time isn't for you, it's got a swathe of perks that are sure to perform very well in any content.Season 22

Slot: Solar | Ammo: Primary | Archetype: Precision

PvE God Roll: Archer's Tempo + Successful Warmup (also good: Explosive Head)Top-tier The Slammer

The Slammer

Sword

SwordVortexHeavyStasisFree-to-PlayYesA › StrongNightfall: The Ordeals

Strong

❘ A

Excels in:

PvENightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Stasis | Ammo: Heavy | Archetype: Vortex

PvE God Roll: Eager Edge + Cold Steel

► While Vortex Frames are typically weak, The Slammer is an exception thanks to its ability to roll Eager Edge and Cold Steel. It does also come with Bait and Switch, however, Vortex Frames will need to receive a number of buffs for this perk to be used on this weapon.Season 23

Slot: Stasis | Ammo: Heavy | Archetype: Vortex

PvE God Roll: Eager Edge + Cold SteelTop-tier Shadow Price

Shadow Price

Auto Rifle

Auto RiflePrecisionPrimaryArcFree-to-PlayYesA › StrongNightfall: The Ordeals

Strong

❘ A

Excels in:

PvPNightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Arc | Ammo: Primary | Archetype: Precision

PvP God Roll: Strategist + Gutshot Straight

► In PvP, Precision Frame Auto Rifles are in a great place right now. However, Shadow Price does not come with many perks that would help it stand out and dominate its competition. Its PvE perks are outstanding, though.The Final Shape

Slot: Arc | Ammo: Primary | Archetype: Precision

PvP God Roll: Strategist + Gutshot StraightTop-tier BrayTech Osprey

BrayTech Osprey

Rocket Launcher

Rocket LauncherHigh-ImpactHeavyVoidFree-to-PlayYesB › AverageNightfall: The Ordeals

Average

❘ B

Excels in:

PvE + PvPNightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Void | Ammo: Heavy | Archetype: High-Impact

PvE God Roll: Envious Assassin (also good: Auto-Loading Holster) + Lasting Impression

PvP God Roll: Cluster Bomb + Chain Reaction

► The original Braytech Osprey was mediocre, and the reissued version follows this trend. While it does have a handful of perks that make other rockets top-tier, Osprey is almost entirely outclassed by top options like Apex Predator and Cold Comfort.Season 21

Slot: Void | Ammo: Heavy | Archetype: High-Impact

PvE God Roll: Envious Assassin (also good: Auto-Loading Holster) + Lasting Impression

PvP God Roll: Cluster Bomb + Chain Reaction THE SWARM

THE SWARM

Machine Gun

Machine GunHigh-ImpactHeavyArcFree-to-PlayYesB › AverageNightfall: The Ordeals

Average

❘ B

Excels in:

PvENightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Arc | Ammo: Heavy | Archetype: High-Impact

PvE God Roll: Surplus (also good: Outlaw) + One for All (also good: Vorpal Weapon)

► THE SWARM is a solid, but not great, Arc machine gun. Like the comparable Terminus Horizon, there isn't enough on offer here to consider it a must-have anymore.Season 13

Slot: Arc | Ammo: Heavy | Archetype: High-Impact

PvE God Roll: Surplus (also good: Outlaw) + One for All (also good: Vorpal Weapon) The Hothead

The Hothead

Rocket Launcher

Rocket LauncherAdaptiveHeavyArcFree-to-PlayYesB › AverageNightfall: The Ordeals

Average

❘ B

Excels in:

PvENightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Arc | Ammo: Heavy | Archetype: Adaptive

PvE God Roll: Auto-Loading Holster (also good: Field Prep) + Lasting Impression (also good: Explosive Light)

► The Hothead has almost completely fallen from popularity due to both meta shifts and recent competition. While it offers a couple of solid picks, the weapon is almost entirely outdated, making farming for it a waste of time.Season 15

Slot: Arc | Ammo: Heavy | Archetype: Adaptive

PvE God Roll: Auto-Loading Holster (also good: Field Prep) + Lasting Impression (also good: Explosive Light) Duty Bound

Duty Bound

Auto Rifle

Auto RifleAdaptivePrimaryKineticFree-to-PlayYesB › AverageNightfall: The Ordeals

Average

❘ B

Excels in:

PvENightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Kinetic | Ammo: Primary | Archetype: Adaptive

PvE God Roll: Stats for All Perpetual Motion + Rampage

► Duty Bound is a decent all-around weapon. It comes with solid perks and can be used effectively pretty much anywhere in the game. 600 RPM Auto Rifles have always had a decent spot in PvE, and Duty Bound does not break this trend.Season 16

Slot: Kinetic | Ammo: Primary | Archetype: Adaptive

PvE God Roll: Stats for All Perpetual Motion + Rampage The Militia's Birthright

The Militia's Birthright

Grenade Launcher

Grenade LauncherLightweightSpecialKineticFree-to-PlayYesB › AverageNightfall: The Ordeals

Average

❘ B

Excels in:

PvENightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Kinetic | Ammo: Special | Archetype: Lightweight

God Rolls: Ambitious Assassin (also good: Slideways) + Auto-Loading Holster

► With slightly better perks than its original version, the reprisal of Militia's Birthright hasn't made it any more enticing than the several other Kinetic GL's out there. Nice to have, but not worth farming for.Season 18

Slot: Kinetic | Ammo: Special | Archetype: Lightweight

God Rolls: Ambitious Assassin (also good: Slideways) + Auto-Loading Holster Buzzard

Buzzard

Sidearm

SidearmAdaptivePrimaryKineticFree-to-PlayYesB › AverageNightfall: The Ordeals

Average

❘ B

Excels in:

PvENightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Kinetic | Ammo: Primary | Archetype: Adaptive

God Rolls: Fourth Time's the Charm (also good: Overflow) + Kinetic Tremors (also good: Frenzy)

► Buzzard had a lot of hype coming in: Fourth Time's + Kinetic Tremors sounded like a devastating combo. However, the reality calls for conditions unsuitable for sidearms, making it more gimmick than anything. However, if used right, Buzzard can make quick work of beefier targets.Season 20

Slot: Kinetic | Ammo: Primary | Archetype: Adaptive

God Rolls: Fourth Time's the Charm (also good: Overflow) + Kinetic Tremors (also good: Frenzy) Loaded Question

Loaded Question

Fusion Rifle

Fusion RifleHigh-ImpactSpecialArcFree-to-PlayYesB › AverageNightfall: The Ordeals

Average

❘ B

Excels in:

PvENightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Arc | Ammo: Special | Archetype: High-Impact

PvE God Roll: Envious Assassin (also good: Overflow) + Controlled Burst (also good: Reservoir Burst)

► A reprised Pinnacle reward, Loaded Question's return has been well received. Not only does it keep Reservoir Burst, but the inclusion of Overflow and Envious means higher uptime for the perk, letting it perform quite well in higher-end content.Season 21

Slot: Arc | Ammo: Special | Archetype: High-Impact

PvE God Roll: Envious Assassin (also good: Overflow) + Controlled Burst (also good: Reservoir Burst) Undercurrent

Undercurrent

Grenade Launcher

Grenade LauncherWaveSpecialArcFree-to-PlayYesB › AverageNightfall: The Ordeals

Average

❘ B

Excels in:

PvENightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Arc | Ammo: Special | Archetype: Wave

PvE God Roll: Demolitionist (also good: Field Prep) + Voltshot

► If you lack The Witch Queen DLC or just can't find a raid group, Undercurrent is your best replacement for Forebearance. While not as strong, it can surely compete thanks to Voltshot being as powerful as it is.Season 23

Slot: Arc | Ammo: Special | Archetype: Wave

PvE God Roll: Demolitionist (also good: Field Prep) + Voltshot The Palindrome

The Palindrome

Hand Cannon

Hand CannonAdaptivePrimaryVoidFree-to-PlayNoB › AverageNightfall: The Ordeals

Average

❘ B

Excels in:

PvPNightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Void | Ammo: Primary | Archetype: Adaptive

PvP God Roll: Killing Wind + Rangefinder

► Because of a couple of perk nerfs in combination with the release of new and potent hand cannons, The Palindrome has seen a slow decline in popularity. While it still isn't a bad pick for The Crucible, there are better options out there.Season 13

Slot: Void | Ammo: Primary | Archetype: Adaptive

PvP God Roll: Killing Wind + Rangefinder Mindbender's Ambition

Mindbender's Ambition

Shotgun

ShotgunAggressiveSpecialSolarFree-to-PlayYesB › AverageNightfall: The Ordeals

Average

❘ B

Excels in:

PvPNightfall: The Ordeals

Free-to-Play

Slot: Solar | Ammo: Special | Archetype: Aggressive

PvP God Rolls: Threat Detector + Fragile Focus

► Mindbender's Ambition is a decent all-rounder. It isn't best-in-class anywhere in the game, but it will get the job done provided it has the right rolls, and a good Adept Mod socketed.Season 18

Slot: Solar | Ammo: Special | Archetype: Aggressive

PvP God Rolls: Threat Detector + Fragile Focus The Comedian

► With a weak archetype, poor stats, and an uninspiring perk selection, this is a weapon you can safely ignore...Season 15
